channel.title: Changing Home in Devo 2.7
channel.description: Im making a server again and lol, i edited the coords in constants.java, compiles(i edited thesecond set of coords) ive tried both and compiled and erased my account but i still start in edgeville..... <3 devo\ Edit- what i mean by home is where you start when you first register*

item.title: Changing Home in Devo 2.7
item.dc:creator: @m4ul_tw1nz m4ul tw1nz
item.description:
@m4ul_tw1nz wrote:

go to ur homeplace in edgeville and type ::coords

note them or just remember,
go to client.java and search for them with CTRL + F

and change them to the new coords

Read full topic
